edge_1: The film began as an Eric Warren Singer screenplay titled American Bullshit, and Hustle is a highly fictionalized version of the Abscam scandal.
edge_2: Hustle is a highly fictionalized version of the Abscam scandal of the late 1970s and early 1980s.
